articles.title: Live content soon on Rs 2k phones with no data pack as D2M tech paves way
articles.description: Mobile users in India will soon enjoy live sports, movies, and web series on their phones without needing an internet connection. New devices from Lava and HMD will support this direct-to-mobile technology. Even smartphone owners can access content using an affordable dongle. Initially, Prasar Bharti content will be available. This innovation promises widespread access to entertainment.
articles.content:

articles.title: Friday's Health Report: Technology transforms radiation treatment for cancer patients
articles.description: Patients with breast cancer now have more options when it comes to radiation treatments.
articles.content:
BATON ROUGE - Patients with breast cancer now have more options when it comes to radiation treatments.
The goal is to remove any remaining cancer cells following chemotherapy or surgery.

articles.title: Dr Jitendra reviews ‘Mission Mausam’, asks for expediting timelines
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent NEW DELHI, Nov 27: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science & Technology; Minister of State for Earth Sciences; MoS PMO, Personnel, Public Grievances, Pensions, Atomic Energy and Space, Dr. Jitendra Singh today chaired a high-level review meeting at the India Meteorological Department (IMD), Ministry of Earth Sciences, to assess the ongoing progress of procurement and installation activities under the ambitious ‘Mission Mausam’ initiative. The Minister asked the concerned officers to expedite the timelines, more so because […]

articles.title: DRDO Successfully Tests Mk-II(A) DEW: Can This Cutting-Edge Laser Weapon Stop Missiles Like Israel’s Iron Beam?
articles.description: With China and Pakistan posing new drone and missile threats, India is testing cutting-edge laser technology to safeguard its skies.
articles.content: New Delhi: The next generation of warfare will belong to countries that dominate in technology. World’s major powers, such as the United States, China, Israel and Russia, have been preparing for modern warfare for years. India is now accelerating its... [3912 chars]

articles.title: OpenAI blames 'misuse' of ChatGPT after 16-year-old kills himself
articles.description: OpenAI blames Adam Raine's suicide on a misuse of technology in new court documents filed in the California lawsuit brought by his parents on November 25.
articles.content:
Lawyers for ChatGPT’s parent company OpenAI claim a teenager “misused” the chatbot when it helped him find a method to kill himself — and even offered to write a suicide letter.
Adam Raine’s parents filed a lawsuit against OpenAI in August after find... [2814 chars]

articles.title: Bhopal News: AIIMS Told To Cut Patient Wait Times, Ensure Medicine Availability
articles.description: AIIMS Governing Body and Institute Body (IB) have been asked to reduce patient waiting time. Meetings held on Thursday focused on improving patient services. Several important points were agreed upon, including reducing waiting time, ensuring uninterrupted availability of essential medicines, expanding various facilities and making hospital management more efficient through modern technology.
articles.content:
Bhopal (Madhya Pradesh): AIIMS Governing Body (GB) and Institute Body (IB) have been asked to reduce patient waiting time. Meetings held on Thursday focused on improving patient services.
